text: Ndipo iwo amene sakhulupirira amati, “Ife sitidzakhulupirira mu Buku la Korani kapena mu icho chimene chidadza kale. Ndipo iwe ukadaona pamene anthu ochita zoipa adzaimirira pamaso pa Ambuye wawo ali kudzudzulana wina ndi mnzake! Iwo amene ankati ndi ofoka adzanena kwa anthu opulupudza kuti, “Pakadapanda inu, ndithudi, ife tikadakhala okhulupirira!”
